page.title: 02MEMEBER OF PARLIAMENT
page.content: {ANDREW STEWART,MEMBER OF PARLIAMENT. Andy Stewart is an M.P and he lives in the grid area. He has been an M.P for 2 years and he is a member of the Conservative Party. When he goes down to London he usually goes down on a Monday and returns on Friday.He doesn't find it tiring going to London. He has four pets,1 dog and 3 cats,but he has not any hobbies(he hasn't enough spare time). When asked,he said he didn't dislike anyone in parliament but he particularily admired the Prime Minister,Mrs.Thatcher. Andy Stewart has a wife and two children. When he goes down to London his wife stays at home. {Andy Stewart is the M.P.for Sherwood.}
